name: Hell! Oh, World (A Capstone Project)
description:
Hell! Oh, World is a visual novel made by Ubepey. It is a story about the struggles of students during the pandemic. This game is mainly made for our thesis paper and is non-commercial.

Format: Visual Novel 

Genre: Slice of life, educational

Length: 40,000+ words

Language: English

Platforms: Windows/Linux/MacOS/Android

Ubepey is a team of 3 IT students in their 4th year. Trying to survive university life.

Main Programmer: Claire

Artist: Franz

UI design: Claire

Script Writer: Franz, and Allen

Editor, Proofreader : Claire

Music: FesliyanStudios

Sprites: Pitzmaker

Cards: Lily diary

Help us gather data for our Capstone Project!

Survey Form: https://forms.gle/4i4dJeZFCaoMZPyL8

Submit bugs here: https://forms.gle/ba4tdvrWi87u88uP8
